description: Excavation below house, part of the front forecourt and rear garden to create new basement; installation of skylights to rear garden and lightwell with metal grille cover to front forecourt; construction of single storey rear extension at lower ground floor level; partial lowering of internal floor level at lower ground floor; replacement of all single glazed windows with Heritage double glazed timber windows; enlargement of front lightwell with new metal stair; provision of air source heat pump and bin storage; installation of 8no. solar panels on roof; alterations to front elevation including removal of soil pipe; replacement of fascia and gutter with brickwork parapet and concealed gutter; installation of new front door, alterations to existing window openings, re-landscaping of rear garden including new gate in Holland Walk and associated internal alterations
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
